description: DCPP is a suite of decadal hindcast and forecast experiments, and mechanism and case study experiments.
keywords: DCPP, decadal climate prediction, hindcast, mechanisms and case studies
label: DCPP
rationale: The undeniable value to society of reliable information about climate variations on decadal time-scales calls for skilful decadal forecasts informed by hindcast experiments and supporting experiments which identify the responsible physical processes and which improve understanding of forced climate change and internal variability.
